title: Bug 101187 - Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the localization key is blank, the externalized text in the chart title cannot be displayed.
EB: The properties file should allow blank keys, but the valid values should still be externalized and displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set a localization key and leave it blank.
2. Verify that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
